Producer: Mark Curcio, Bob Yari, Cathy Schulman, Tom Nunan
Synopsis: The perpetually unlucky David Walsh (Matt Dillon) thinks he finally has it made after landing his dream job at a bank and getting engaged to Sara (Christina Applegate), a seemingly perfect woman. But in a single day, he's let go at work and his fianc√©e breaks up with him. Livid, David decides to come back to the bank armed and confront his boss, but, as he does so, a heist takes place. David's day somehow gets worse as the robbers draw him into their violent scheme.
Title: Employee of the Month
